articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on significant December 24.
					 Kim Jong Un entered the hall where statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il are standing.
					
					 Seen standing on both sides of the statues were flags of the WPK and the DPRK and army colors. The guard of honor of the Ground, Naval, Air and Anti-air Forces of the KPA and the Worker-Peasant Red Guards lined up beside them.
					
					 The chief of the guard of honor made a salute to the statues.
					
					 A floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un was placed before the statues.
					
					 Also laid before them was a floral basket in the name of the KPA.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, together with other visitors, paid high tribute to the statues.
					
					 Kim Jong Un entered the hall where Kim Il Sung lies in state.
					
					 He, together with other visitors, paid homage to Kim Il Sung in the humblest reverence for him.
					
					 He looked round the hall where the orders Kim Il Sung received are on display and the halls which house a train coach and a car used by Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Kim Jong Un entered the hall where Kim Jong Il lies in state.
					
					 He, together with other visitors, paid homage to Kim Jong Il in the humblest reverence for him.
					
					 He looked round the hall where the orders Kim Jong Il received are on display, the mourning hall and the halls which house a car, an electric car, a boat and a train coach used by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, Pyon In Son, So Hong Chan, Kim Su Gil, Ryom Chol Song and other commanding officers of the KPA.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Libyan Congress
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Libyan Congress
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a message of greeting to Nouri Abu Sahmain, president of the General National Congress of Libya, on the independence day of Libya.
					 Sincerely wishing the president and people of Libya successes in their work for security, stability and economic development of the country, the message expressed conviction that the friendly and cooperative ties between the DPRK and Libya would steadily develop on good terms.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Meets Russians
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Meets Russians
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the Cabinet of the DPRK, met and had a talk with Oleg Shishov, director general of the "Mostovik" Scientific-Industrial Company of Russia, and his party, which paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Tuesday.

articles.title: Gift from "Mostovik" Scientific-Industrial Company of Russia
articles.content:
Gift from "Mostovik" Scientific-Industrial Company of Russia
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with a gift by the "Mostovik" Scientific-Industrial Company of Russia.
					 The gift was handed to Pak Pong Ju, premier of the Cabinet, on Tuesday by Oleg Shishov, its director general on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Russians Leave for Home
articles.content:
Russians Leave for Home
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Oleg Shishov, director general of the "Mostovik" Scientific-Industrial Company of Russia, and his party, left here for home on Tuesday.

articles.title: Senior Party, State Officials Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Senior Party, State Officials Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Senior party and state officials visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Tuesday on the occasion of the 22nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 They included such senior party and state officials as Kim Yong Nam and Pak Pong Ju, officials of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea in Pyongyang and officials of the Cabinet, organs of the armed forces, working people's organizations and ministries.
					
					 Seen standing before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il was a floral basket sent by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the KPA.
					
					 A floral basket in the name of the KPA was laid there.
					
					 Placed there was a floral basket in the joint name of the WPK Central Committee, the WPK Central Military Commission, the NDC of the DPRK, the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and the DPRK Cabinet.
					
					 The visitors paid tribute to the statues.
					
					 At the halls where Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state they made bows to them.
					
					 They went round the halls where the orders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il received are on display, the mourning hall and the halls which house cars, an electric car, a boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign trips till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Jong Suk
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, and staff members of its mission Tuesday laid bouquets before the bust of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong on the occasion of the 96th anniversary of her birth.
					 They paid silent tribute to her bust in memory of her revolutionary life.

articles.title: Military Attaches Corps Visits Factory of KPA
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Visits Factory of KPA
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here visited the November 16 Factory of the Korean People's Army (KPA) on Tuesday, the 22nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the KPA and the 2nd anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the same post.
					 The members of the corps went round various production processes of the foodstuff processing base which have been put on an automated basis under the loving care shown by the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu for KPA service personnel.
					
					 At the end of the visit Iranian military attache Hassan Reza Husseini who is the doyen of the military attaches corps wrote in the visitor's book that supply service plays an important role in rounding off combat preparations, wishing the factory greater success in the foodstuff production.
					
					 Meanwhile, the corps visited the Munsu Recovery Center.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Jong Suk
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets were laid with due ceremonies before statues of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk in Kim Jong Suk County, Hoeryong City, Kim Jong Suk Naval University and Kim Jong Suk General Military Academy Tuesday on the occasion of the 96th anniversary of her birth.
					 Present at the ceremonies were officials of local party and power organs and working people's organizations, service personnel of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces (KPISF), people of all social strata, school youth and children.
					
					 Floral baskets and bouquets were placed before the statues of Kim Jong Suk in the name of local party and power organs and working people's organizations, units of the KPA and the KPISF, industrial establishments, farms and schools.
					
					 Participants paid high tribute to Kim Jong Suk who, with loyalty to President Kim Il Sung, devoted her all to the liberation and prosperity of the country and happiness of the people, and opened a bright future of the revolutionary cause of Juche.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Bust of Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Bust of Kim Jong Suk
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the bust of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong on Tuesday, the 96th anniversary of her birth.
					 Seen before the bust was a wreath sent by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and other senior party and state officials, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, working people and school youth and children in Pyongyang.
					
					 Laid before the bust were wreaths in the name of the Central Committee of the WPK, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the DPRK Cabinet.
					
					 Also placed were wreaths in the name of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, working people's organizations, ministries, national institutions, KPA units, educational, public health and media institutions, the Korean Children's Union and party and power organs, factories and farms in the city.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of Kim Jong Suk's revolutionary life.

articles.title: Performance Given by KPA Song and Dance Ensemble
articles.content:
Performance Given by KPA Song and Dance Ensemble
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The Korean People's Army Song and Dance Ensemble gave a performance "General Is Banner of Eternal Victory" at the April 25 House of Culture on Tuesday to celebrate the 22nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the KPA and the 96th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk. 
					 Put on the stage were colorful pieces including mixed chorus "General Is Banner of Victory", kayagum ensemble "Thinking of Journeys for Songun Leadership", tap dance "Pleasure of Recruit" and dance "Final Battle". 
					
					 The performers highly praised the exploits Generalissimo Kim Jong Il performed by developing the KPA into a matchless army and putting the dignity of the country and its might on the highest phase as a creditable successor to the cause of army-building started on Mt. Paektu. 
					
					 Female quintet "Arirang on Jiansanfeng" made the audience miss Kim Jong Suk more ardently as she handed down the spirit of devotedly defending the leader as eternal treasure of the party and the revolution and gave steady continuity to the tradition of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Mixed duet and mixed chorus "Party's Flag, together with It Forever" and mixed chorus and tap dance "7th Regiment Is in the Van of Us Today, Too" truthfully represented the strong faith and will of the service personnel to uphold supreme leader Kim Jong Un as the unitary center of unity and leadership and fly the red flag of the Workers' Party of Korea as the No. 1 colors of the KPA.
					
					 Among the audience were senior party, state and army officials including Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and Choe Ryong Hae, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, the Cabinet, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and Pyongyangites. 
					
					 Present there on invitation were the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, overseas Koreans, foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international bodies and military attaches and their wives here and other foreign guests.

articles.title: Art Squad of Youth League Gives Performance
articles.content:
Art Squad of Youth League Gives Performance
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The art squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League gave a performance at the Central Youth Hall Tuesday, the 22nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 96th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 The performance began with narration and song "Ode to the Motherland." Put on the stage were such colorful numbers as female solo and panchang "Soldiers Answered".
					
					 The performers praised Kim Jong Il for developing the KPA into an invincible revolutionary Paektusan army and putting the dignity and strength of Kim Il Sung's nation on the highest level.
					
					 Female vocal quartette "Arirang on Jiansanfeng" and other numbers helped the audience recollect the revolutionary life of Kim Jong Suk, woman commander of Mt. Paektu, who provided the precious tradition of devotedly defending the leader.
					
					 Male vocal duet "Youth" and others represented the dignity and honor of young vanguard under the leadership of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Among the audience were Ri Yong Su, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the youth league, and officials of the youth league, youth and students.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students took place in Pyongyang on Tuesday, the 22nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 96th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 Amid the playing of song "Confetti of Best Wishes" at the plazas of the Monument to Party Founding, the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium, the Arch of Triumph and other places youth and students danced representing thanks to Kim Jong Il who strengthened the military capability of Kim Il Sung's Korea in every way and firmly defended socialism.
					
					 "Unforgettable Echoes over Lagoon Samil", "Arirang on Jiansanfeng" and other songs praising Kim Jong Suk's revolutionary career and feats helped youth and students harden the will to devotedly defend supreme leader Kim Jong Un politically and ideologically and at the cost of their lives, and dynamically advance along the road of the Songun revolution by following the revolutionary spirit of the woman commander of Mt. Paektu. 
					
					 Dancing parties took place in different places of the country on the same day.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days Observed in Pyongyang and Local Areas
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days Observed in Pyongyang and Local Areas
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Art performances were given in Pyongyang and local areas on the occasion of the 22nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership  of the Korean People's Army and the 96th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 The National Theatrical Troupe staged drama "Woman Comrade of Mt. Paektu" at the National Theatre.
					
					 The drama impressively represented the transparent spirit of devotedly defending the leader and revolutionary comradeship displayed by Kim Jong Suk during the anti-Japanese war.
					
					 The Samjiyon Band of the Mansudae Art Troupe performed diverse art numbers at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre.
					
					 The performers highly praised the feats of Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 Concert "Please Receive Our Salute" was given by the National Symphony Orchestra at the Moranbong Theatre.
					
					 Physical acrobatics "Let Us Fly Higher" and "Man and Woman Ring Plastic Etude", jugglery "Longing Mind" and other acrobatic pieces were staged at the Pyongyang Circus Theatre and the Pothonggang Circus Theatre.
					
					 There took place colorful events in Jagang, South Hwanghae, North and South Hamgyong provinces and other local areas.
					
					 Through the presentations of poems and songs and oratorical meetings working people and school youth and children across the country vividly represented their ardent yearning for the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu. They also had sports and amusement games, revving up the festive atmosphere.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats for Army Building in DPRK
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats for Army Building in DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Today marks the 22nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 On the anniversary, all servicepersons and civilians of the DPRK recall with deep emotion the undying feats he performed in leading the Songun revolution.
					
					 Kim Jong Il was appointed to the KPA supreme commandership at the 19th Plenary Meeting of the 6th Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea on December 24, Juche 80 (1991).
					
					 Since then, he had pursued on a full scale the Songun (military-first) politics for two decades, thus performing great exploits to be recorded in the history of building the Juche-based revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 With his visit to the Dwarf Pine Post in January 1995, he always found himself among the servicepersons, sometimes inspecting frontline and island posts and sometimes mounting warships, planes and tanks to guide military trainings.
					
					 His military inspection ceaselessly continued despite bad weather conditions, reaching to all places where soldiers are standing in the country.
					
					 His journey of Songun guidance totaled a course of over 10,000 km in 1996, 12,000 km in 1997 and 16,000 km in 1998.
					
					 He visited more than 2,490 military units until the last moments of his life.
					
					 His energetic Songun leadership turned the KPA into invincible armed forces with powerful offensive and defensive means and all the servicepersons into stalwart combatants ready to defend their supreme commander with their lives.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk Always Remembered by Korean People
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk Always Remembered by Korean People
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The people in the DPRK recall with deep emotion the immortal exploits performed by Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese war hero who devoted her noble life to the freedom and independence of the country, on the occasion of her 96th birth anniversary (December 24).
					 After embarking on the road of revolution led by President Kim Il Sung in her early age, Kim Jong Suk performed distinguished feats in the bloody war against the Japanese army.
					
					 In particular, she accomplished brilliant feats as a superb markswoman in different battlefields including Fusong county town, Hongqihe and Dashahe gully. 
					
					 The Korean people still engrave in their minds her image firing at the enemies with two Mausers in both hands to defend the headquarters of revolution.
					
					 Once in a battle, she fired a single shot at midnight to cut off the enemy's telephone line. Beside this, there are a lot of anecdotes conveying her ace marksmanship. In praise of her marksmanship, her fellow guerrillas maintained that her shots would likely have eyes.
					
					 She always said that all the fighters under the command of Kim Il Sung should regard it not only as a simple military duty but as a noble mission for devotedly defending Kim Il Sung, the destiny of the Korean nation, to acquire high marksmanship.
					
					 Even After the liberation of Korea from the Japanese colonial rule, she remained invariable in devotedly defending Kim Il Sung with arms until the last days of her life. 
					
					 Therefore, all the servicepersons and people in the DPRK are paying the highest tribute to Kim Jong Suk, who will always live in their hearts with the red flag of the revolution, on the occasion of her birth anniversary.

articles.title: Officials of Women's Union Visit Hoeryong Revolutionary Site
articles.content:
Officials of Women's Union Visit Hoeryong Revolutionary Site
 Hoeryong, December 24 (KCNA) -- Officials and members of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea visited the Hoeryong Revolutionary Site on Monday and Tuesday on the occasion of the 96th anniversary of birth of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the statue of Kim Jong Suk on Osan Hill before paying tribute to her.
					
					 Then they visited her low-roofed old home. They looked round historic relics preserved with care there, being briefed on the fact that she was born into a patriotic and revolutionary family and grew up to be a revolutionary.
					
					 At the Hoeryong Revolutionary Museum they deeply recollected the revolutionary exploits of Kim Jong Suk, woman commander of Mt. Paektu, who devoted her all to the country and its people, holding President Kim Il Sung in high esteem.
					
					 The visitors hardened their will to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche, true to the guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un by learning from the transparent spirit of devotedly defending the leader and indomitable fighting spirit displayed by Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 They also toured Kim Ki Song Hoeryong Senior Secondary School, the Hoeryong Essential Foodstuff Factory, the Hoeryong Foodstuff-processing Factory and the Hoeryong Koryo Medicine Pharmaceutical Factory.

articles.title: Activists in Fisheries of KPA Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Activists in Fisheries of KPA Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Participants in the Meeting of Activists in Fisheries of the Korean People's Army (KPA) Tuesday visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun to pay tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They made bows to their statues standing in the hall.
					
					 They entered the halls where Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state and paid homage to them with inmost feelings that they have registered great successes in improving the living standard of soldiers and bolstering up the combat capability under the loving care of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They looked round the halls where the orders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il received are on display, the mourning hall and the halls which house cars, an electric car, a boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign trips till the last moments of their life.

articles.title: Year 2013 Witnesses Might of Single-minded Unity
articles.content:
Year 2013 Witnesses Might of Single-minded Unity
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Juche 102 (2013) is a year of significance, in which the DPRK has registered signal achievements in building a thriving socialist nation with the might of harmonious whole of the leader and people, deterring all sorts of challenges.
					 From the outset of the year, the U.S. and other hostile forces have run amuck in their moves to stifle the DPRK, taking issue with it over its successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 and 3rd underground nuclear test, to lay hurdles in the advance of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 On the plea of "threat from someone", the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group have waged one after another joint military drills including Key Resolve and Foal Eagle with strategic nuclear strike means involved, extremely aggravating the situation on the Korean Peninsula, in a bid to block the DPRK's peaceful development and building of economic power.
					
					 However, the DPRK servicepersons and people have smash their provocations step by step by dint of the might of single-minded unity under the leadership of the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un to push forward the building a highly civilized socialist nation.
					
					 Kim Jong Un saw to it that the Law on the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun was adopted to raise the palace to the status of a grand monument to eternity of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					  This year, Kim Jong Un has always found himself among the servicepersons and people, showing boundless loving care for them.
					
					 When making inspection tours of islet defence detachments in the southwestern front, he acquainted himself in detail with the livelihood of servicepersons and their families and took measures for bettering their living conditions.
					
					 Deeply moved by his deep loving care, they threw themselves in his arms with tears and even jumped into billows of the sea to wave farewell to him.
					
					 Out of ardent yearning for a veteran revolutionary who passed away years ago, he visited the hall "Supreme Commander and Comrades-in-arms" and recalled his meritorious services with deep emotion. When officers and sailors of a unit of the Korean People's Army met heroic deaths while performing their combat duty, he visited their grave and asked the commanding officers of the unit to carve his name on the gravestone to be its owner.
					
					 Whenever he receives letters from working people, servicepersons and students, he has sent reply letters of trust to each of them.
					
					 This year, the invincible vitality of the single-minded unity has fully been displayed through a series of meetings and celebrations, including the military parade and Pyongyang mass demonstration to mark the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War, the 4th Meeting of the KPA Company Commanders and Political Instructors and the 7th Congress of the Korean Children's Union (KCU).
					
					 The fatherly loving care shown by Kim Jong Un has moved all the servicepersons and people of the DPRK to be a harmonious whole with the leader and inspired them to work miracles in building a thriving nation.
					
					 They have built the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum and the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery, the apartment houses for educators of Kim Il Sung University, the Unha Scientists Street, the Okryu Children's Hospital, the Ryugyong Dental Hospital, Munsu Water Park, Mirim Riding Club, etc. in a short span of time by applying the "speed on Masik Pass".
					
					 This year also witnesses the growth of production capabilities in the leading sectors of the national economy and big achievements in all fields of cultural construction including education, public health, sports, literature and art.
					
					 The purge of chance and alien elements from the party made the single-minded unity of the revolutionary ranks purer and more consolidated to manifest the transparent will of all the servicepersons and people to uphold Kim Jong Un as the unitary center of unity and leadership.
					
					 The DPRK servicepersons and people are fully determined to further strengthen the might of the single-hearted unity, closely rallied around Kim Jong Un and bring earlier the final victory in building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Ice-hockey Matches of Sports Contest for Osandok Prize Close
articles.content:
Ice-hockey Matches of Sports Contest for Osandok Prize Close
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Ice-hockey matches of the sports contest for Osandok Prize closed on Tuesday. They started in the Ice Rink on December 5.
					 Four teams of men and women each which proved successful in the first round of league matches played the second round of league matches for final standings.
					
					 Men and women players of the Pyongyang Railway Bureau Sports Team and the Taesongsan Sports Team played good matches through a combination of agile pass and admirable shooting.
					
					 In the men's ice-hockey event players of the Pyongyang Railway Bureau Sports Team came first and players of the Taesongsan Sports Team and the Sports Team of the Ministry of Fisheries second and third.
					
					 In the women's event players of the Taesongsan Sports Team won the title while players of the Sports Team of Kanggye University of Education No. 1 and the Jangjasan Sports Team placed second and third.

articles.title: Papers Call for Glorifying Songun Revolutionary Feats for All Ages
articles.content:
Papers Call for Glorifying Songun Revolutionary Feats for All Ages
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Papers Tuesday carry editorials on the occasion of the 22nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the KPA made it possible to open the bright future of the country and the nation and provide a sure guarantee for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche started in Mt. Paektu by dint of the might of Songun, Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
					
					  The cause of the Juche-oriented army building has greeted a new heyday and the overall military capability of the country has been rapidly strengthened since he started the Songun-based revolutionary leadership.
					
					 A particular mention should be made of the fact that he formulated and systematized the Songun idea and established it as the powerful Songun political mode under socialism. This was the historic event that provided the eternal foundation for the prosperity of the country and nation. 
					
					 A proud victory was won in the anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. confrontation and the national power with the military capability as a core was incomparably strengthened in the 90s of the last century and the 10s of the new century. This is the precious fruition of his Songun politics and Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 Thanks to his experienced leadership, the KPA has grown up to be the invincible revolutionary Paektusan army which upholds the idea and cause of the leader with faith.
					
					 The DPRK demonstrated its might as an invincible military power equipped with the powerful war deterrence under his leadership.
					
					 All service personnel and people have achieved an invincible integral whole, rallied close around the leader with one idea and intention, comradely love and revolutionary sense of obligation, and a solid harmonious whole in which the army devotedly serve the people and the people love the army like their kinsmen and sincerely assist the army. This is the true picture of the great army-people unity achieved under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Minju Joson says:
					
					 He was the peerlessly brilliant Songun commander who performed the undying feats for the accomplishment of the Juche-based army building and the prosperity of the socialist country while steering the Korean revolution through his Songun revolutionary leadership for decades. His Songun revolutionary idea and feats will be everlasting.

articles.title: Minju Joson Urges US to Face up to Public Mind-set
articles.content:
Minju Joson Urges US to Face up to Public Mind-set
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The U.S. Pew Research Center recently conducted an opinion poll on the subject of "2013 position of the U.S. in the world".
					 According to its results, more than half of the U.S. population said that their country should not interfere in the internal affairs of foreign countries; it ought to settle its issues on its own; and it should let other countries solve their issues at their will.
					
					 The center has carried out the similar poll for nearly 50 years. The recent one is something unprecedented as the majority of those polled voiced such an opinion.
					
					 Minju Joson Tuesday, commenting on this, says: 
					
					 The recent poll suggests that the U.S. foreign policy with main emphasis on interference in the internal affairs of other countries is not welcomed even in the U.S. only to be rejected and come under fire by its people.
					
					 The present times are an era of independence and nobody wants to be shackled by others.
					
					 Quite contrary to this, however, the U.S. has been bent on domination, subjugation, aggression and war as well as destruction and plunder.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. which forces other countries to accept its view on value, regarding its own as an absolute one; resorts to the high-handed and arbitrary military practices against those who are disobedient to it; and brandishes the stick of sanctions at will.
					
					 The foreign policy of the U.S. seeking hegemony is the main factor of leading it to self-destruction.
					
					 The U.S. had better drop such an outdated foreign policy doing harm to others as well as to itself, and mind its own business.

articles.title: KCNA on US "Theory of Threat from N. Korea"
articles.content:
KCNA on US "Theory of Threat from N. Korea"
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The United States is nowadays getting more vociferous about "threat from north Korea", announcing that it would build THAAD in Guam to cope with the "unpredictable threat".
					 Such assertiveness on the "theory of threat" was prompted by an insidious scheme to justify the U.S. strategy for domination over the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 As openly asserted by officials of the U.S. Defense Department, THAAD, to be established in vast area from Alaska to Australia including south Korea, Japan and Philippines, is tantamount to a siege to target for regional powers.
					
					 The "theory of threat from north Korea" is nothing but a smokescreen to cover up such scheme, and the real aim of the U.S. is to contain its potential rivals by speeding up arms buildup in the Asia-Pacific region with establishment of MD system involved.
					
					 This fact is well illustrated in a report of the "U.S.-China Economic Security Review Subcommittee" released in November.
					
					 In the report, the U.S. said that China's military muscle is challenging the U.S. forces' influence over the Asia-Pacific region, adding that the modern and rising Chinese military capabilities are able to strike the U.S. military bases in Guam. The report also noted that the regional equilibrium of forces is changing with the decrease of the U.S. military strength due to the forced reduction of domestic defense expenditure, in contrast to the increase of China's military capabilities, and the U.S. pivot to Asia-Pacific strategy is weakening in terms of restraint.
					
					 The facts show that the U.S. intensified establishment of THAAD is aimed to contain its rivals growing in strength and maintain its military hegemony in the region.
					
					 Such moves of the U.S. triggered off strong concern and repulsion from regional powers.
					
					 Under the situation, the U.S. B-52 bombers flew in the air defense identification zone set up by China, without giving notice in late November. And a spokesman for the U.S. Defense Department announced that those bombers passed through the air above Senkaku Islands, in a bid to irritate China. Consequently, the China-U.S. friction got more serious, rendering the regional situation strained. 
					
					 With the case, the U.S. felt the need to urgently round off the establishment of such combat and operational systems as MD in line with the acute military confrontation with regional powers. So, it raised again the worn-out "theory of threat from north Korea" to divert elsewhere the attention of regional countries. 
					
					 But no one can get deceived by such petty tricks. On the contrary, accusation against the U.S. wrong assertion is growing stronger among the world public, which contended in general that the U.S. counteraction to the DPRK is fairly asymmetric and that the U.S. establishment of MD is undoubtedly intended to control the nuclear potentials of China and Russia, its geopolitical rivals. 
					
					 In a word, the "theory of threat from north Korea" is a sheer sophism. 
					
					 Intolerable is the U.S. scheme to spoil the situation of the Asia-Pacific region trending toward peace and development.

articles.title: S. Korean Police Suppress Labor Movement Organization
articles.content:
S. Korean Police Suppress Labor Movement Organization
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The puppet police kicked off a massive repressive campaign against the Confederation of Trade Unions on Sunday, according to the south Korean KBS.
					 Thousands of puppet police, which already besieged the building of the headquarters of the Confederation of Trade Unions, creating a terror-ridden atmosphere, finally attempted an entry into the building allegedly to arrest core members of the railway trade union on Sunday.
					
					 Those unionists in their sit-in there fiercely struggled against the police.
					
					 The police broke the glass of the entrance door, spread tear liquid and stormed into the building, ransacking office rooms and arresting at least 100 trade unionists.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Bid to Privatize Railways Denounced
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Bid to Privatize Railways Denounced
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People on Dec. 20 carried an article denouncing the south Korean puppet government authorities for trying to privatize railways. 
					 The article said: 
					
					 Park Geun Hye is reneging on her election commitments that she would not privatize railways. 
					
					 The Park regime is suppressing the strike of the Railway Trade Union protesting against railways privatization, branding it as "unjustified one hurting economy". 
					
					 The world community is criticizing the behavior of the present "government" as undemocratic repression of the dictatorial regime. 
					
					 If railways are privatized, business managers keen on seeking profits would not properly repair protection devices, signal facilities and railway lines only to increase accidents.
					
					 Those countries which underwent the hardships after their railways privatization are nationalizing railways again. Nevertheless, the present "government" is further deteriorating people's living in disregard of reality.

articles.title: "Saenuri Party" Assailed in S. Korea
articles.content:
"Saenuri Party" Assailed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The parliamentary spokesman from the Democratic Party of south Korea called a press conference at the "National Assembly" on Dec. 20 denouncing the reckless remarks of the floor leader of the "Saenuri Party".
					 He recalled that that day the floor leader termed those against the privatization of medical service "cancer-like entity."
					
					 He said that the "Saenuri Party" is certain to have the conception dating back to "yusin" dictatorship as evidenced by the remarks of the floor leader.
					
					 South Korean society is in mess as such ruling party is pursuing politics, he charged.
					
					 The floor leader's remarks are aimed to gag the people, he said, demanding him make an apology to them.

articles.title: S. Korean Police's Suppression under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Police's Suppression under Fire
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Representatives of different social organizations in south Korea held a press conference at the meeting room of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) on Monday in denunciation of the puppet police's suppression.
					 Speakers at the press conference expressed resentment at the fact that the police went on a rampage after storming into offices of the KCTU on Sunday. 
					
					 This repression without any search-warrant is clearly illegal act, they said. 
					
					 They urged the authorities to punish those responsible and immediately stop the suppression of trade unions and the moves to privatize railways. 
					
					 Now women and law organizations and other people of different social standings are protesting against the police's repression, they said, expressing the will to wage a million-citizen action and other actions in solidarity with the general strike of the KCTU.

articles.title: Protest against Railways Privatization Goes on in S. Korea
articles.content:
Protest against Railways Privatization Goes on in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The Railway Trade Union of south Korea held a meeting at Chonggye Plaza in Seoul on Dec. 21 in protest against the puppet regime's policy for privatization of railways. It was attended by at least 3,000 unionists.
					 Speakers at the meeting said the authorities managed railways in an irresponsible manner to be saddled with debts and are insisting on justice of privatization, talking about the efficiency of management. 
					
					 The authorities are cracking down on the action of the trade union against privatization, distorting the essence of the action, they said, and went on:
					
					 We should not step back from the present action, but wage more vigorous action together with the people who joined in the strike. 
					
					 Then, the unionists held a candlelight meeting with citizens from all walks of life. 
					
					 The participants in the meeting expressed their will to continue the action until the authorities' bid for privatization is withdrawn.

articles.title: Koreans in US Demand Resignation of Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
Koreans in US Demand Resignation of Park Geun Hye
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Koreans in the U.S. held a candlelight rally in Maryland State, the U.S. on Dec. 18 demanding the resignation of the chief executive of south Korea. 
					 Speakers at the rally denounced the south Korean "government" authorities for suppressing the forces demanding the probe into truth about the illegal election. 
					
					 If the "presidential" election was not properly conducted, it should become null and void, they said. 
					
					 They urged to nullify the "presidential" election, detain and investigate Lee Myung Bak and disband power bodies which interfered in the election.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Website by Nigerian Social Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Website by Nigerian Social Body
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's talk "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" was posted by the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea on its website on December 17. The talk was published in Rodong Sinmun, organ of the Workers' Party of Korea, and Joson Inmingun, organ of the Korean People's Army, on the occasion of the Day of Songun.
					 The talk, made public on August 25, Juche 102 (2013), deals with the Songun revolutionary feats of leader Kim Jong Il and clarifies the essence and originality of the idea of the Songun revolution and the tasks to successfully accomplish the revolutionary cause of Songun.

articles.title: Seminars on Kim Jong Un's Work Held in Italy, Austria
articles.content:
Seminars on Kim Jong Un's Work Held in Italy, Austria
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Seminars on supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" took place in Italy and Austria on Dec. 14 and 18.
					 On display in the venues of the seminars were works of leader Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un and books and photos introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Present there were personages of relevant countries and regional bodies and masses. Present there on invitation were staff members of the DPRK missions in those countries.
					
					 The general secretary of the Movement for Peace and Socialism of Italy who is also chairman of the committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il said:
					
					 It is two years since Kim Jong Il, the great leader of the Korean people, passed away.
					
					 He was a great leader who defended socialism by leading the Korean people to victory at the end of the last century when the DPRK faced the hardest ordeals.
					
					 His undying exploits will shine forever.
					
					 The general secretary of the Juche Idea Study Society of the European Region praised him as the master of politics who performed great exploits for the cause of global independence.
					
					 The chief of the Rome Youth Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Songun Idea of Italy and other speakers lauded him for providing a nuclear deterrence through his Songun revolutionary leadership and thus developing the DPRK into a socialist power.
					
					 The chief of the Youth Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Kim Jong Il in Vienna, Austria said the work of Kim Jong Un serves as a precious one to be regarded as a guideline for not only the Korean people but also progressive mankind.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar in Austria.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Observed Abroad
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- A political party and organizations of Russia, Brazil and Germany posted special write-ups on their websites between December 16 and 18 to commemorate the 2nd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The Communists Party of Russia in an article titled "Eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea" noted Kim Jong Il who dedicated his all to the prosperity of the country and happiness of its people till the last moments of his life will always live along with the ever-victorious WPK.
					
					 The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK posted an article illustrated with a photo documenting revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Il and supreme leader Kim Jong Un, which said:
					
					 Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il was born in Mt. Paektu in snowy February and was bidden the last farewell by the people in snowy December.
					
					 His life was a pure one.
					
					 He saw to it that monuments and statues were erected for revolutionary forerunners and those who performed great feats for the country, but didn't allow erecting even a small statue for him.
					
					 His noble life will always be remembered by the Korean people and other progressive mankind.
					
					 The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany posted an article lauding Kim Jong Il for dedicating himself to the country and its people and the accomplishment of the human cause of independence. It was illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: DPRK's Holidays Observed by Bangladeshi, Russian Media
articles.content:
DPRK's Holidays Observed by Bangladeshi, Russian Media
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Media of Bangladesh and Russia featured articles to mark the 22nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 2nd anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the same post.
					 The Bangladeshi paper Natun Katha on Dec. 11 noted in an article titled "Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism":
					
					 The revolutionary ideas of President Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il recognized as the great guiding idea in the era of independence was formulated as Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism by supreme leader Kim Jong Un. This is a great event for all those who struggle for independence and socialism.
					
					 The validity and vitality of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism were clearly proved by the past and present days of the DPRK characterized by its victory and glory.
					
					 The Dec. 18-24 issue of the Russian paper Pravda Primoriya devoted a full page to a special write-up captioned "Conviction of victory" illustrated with photos of Kim Jong Un inspecting units of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Noting that he inspected the detachments in Jangjae and Mu Islets located at the biggest hotspot in the southernmost part of the southwestern sector of the front, the paper said his inspection helped the service personnel of the KPA and people cherish deep the firm conviction of victory in their minds.
					
					 The Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in the Far Eastern Region of Russia on Nov. 28 posted on its website an article titled "Marshal and children" illustrated with photos of Kim Jong Un finding himself among children. The article praised his noble outlook on future.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days Observed by British Organizations
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days Observed by British Organizations
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association jointly released a special bulletin "Star of Independence" on Dec. 16 on the occasions of the 2nd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il, the 22nd anniversary of his assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA), the 2nd anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the KPA and the 96th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 The bulletin carried articles illustrated with photos showing the undying exploits of Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un.
					
					 An article titled "Comrade Kim Jong Il, eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and eternal chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK" said that Kim Jong Il who wisely led the building of a thriving socialist nation was a genius of creation and construction, adding:
					
					 He was a leader of the people who valued them very much and a gifted thinker and theoretician who comprehensively systematized, developed and enriched the Juche idea.
					
					 He firmly defended the sovereignty and socialism of the DPRK by pursuing the original Songun politics.
					
					 He will always be alive in the hearts of the followers of the Juche idea and the Songun idea.
					
					 Another article titled "Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un with steel-strong pluck" said he is the symbol of invincibility of Songun Korea and its future and the center of eternal unity and leadership.
					
					 The bulletin in an article titled "Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Suk" said:
					
					 The greatest exploit of Kim Jong Suk is that she ensured the rosy future of the DPRK.
					
					 The exploits she performed by bringing up Kim Jong Il with her warmest heart to be the great revolutionary and the genuine son of the country and its people will shine long in history.

articles.title: Cambodian Radios Introduce Socialist Construction in DPRK
articles.content:
Cambodian Radios Introduce Socialist Construction in DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Cambodian radios reported that a new speed of socialist construction is being created in the DPRK.
					 The State Radio Broadcasting Service on Dec. 18, referring to the "Speed on Masik Pass", said:
					
					 The Democratic People's Republic of Korea is dynamically advancing at the "Speed on Masik Pass".
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un initiated the building of a ski resort in the area of Masik Pass.
					
					 Service personnel of the Korean People's Army built various ski courses 40 to 120 m in width and 110,000 m in total length in less than a year.
					
					 Kim Jong Un highly appreciated the soldier-builders for having carried out the huge project that would take others more than 10 years to accomplish.
					
					 He sent an appeal to all service personnel and people to usher in a new heyday on all fronts of socialist construction at the "Speed on Masik Pass."
					
					 Amid the high-pitched drive for applying the "Speed on Masik Pass", they brought about leaping progress in all fields of economic construction.
					
					 The reclaimers of Sepho Tableland achieved great successes in the creation of pasture and brought about uninterrupted innovations in the building of stock-breeding bases.
					
					 Making a round of apartment houses for scientists, Kim Jong Un said that it was a remarkable achievement that such excellent apartment houses were built in a short span of time, calling it a fruition of "Speed on Masik Pass" intended by the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					 The FM 90.5 Radio aired similar program on Dec. 19.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan con motivo del 24 de diciembre
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan con motivo del 24 de diciembre
Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del significativo 24 de diciembre, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan.
					Entro en el hall donde se encuentran las estatuas de pie de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					
					Al lado de las estatuas estaban colocadas las banderas del partido, la RPDC y del ejercito y enfilada la guardia de honor de las fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas del EPC y del Ejercito Rojo Obrero-Campesino.
					
					El jefe de la guardia de honor dio el parte de recepcion hacia las estatuas de los Generalisimos.
					
					Seguidamente, fueron colocados al pie de ellas un cesto de flores en nombre del Mariscal y el otro en nombre del EPC.
					
					Junto con los participantes en la ceremonia de homenaje, el Mariscal rindio sublime tributo a los Generalisimos ante sus estatuas e hizo lo mismo en los salones de eternidad donde estan conservados los cuerpos de ellos.
					
					Y recorrio el hall de llantos, las salas de conservacion de las ordenes, los carros, el coche electrico, el barco y los vagones del tren utilizados por los Generalisimos.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, Pyon In Son, So Hong Chan, Kim Su Gil, Ryom Chol Song y otros comandantes del EPC.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a Nouri Abu Sahmain
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a Nouri Abu Sahmain
Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 24 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente del Congreso Nacional General de Libia, Nouri Abu Sahmain en ocasion del dia de la independencia de este pais africano.
					El remitente desea de todo corazon al destinatario y su pueblo los exitos en la labor para alcanzar la seguridad, la estabilidad y el desarrollo economico del pais y expresa la conviccion de que seguiran desarrollandose las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre la RPDC y Libia.

articles.title: Premier coreano se reune con Oleg Shishov y su comitiva
articles.content:
Premier coreano se reune con Oleg Shishov y su comitiva
Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju departio el dia 24 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con el director general de la Compania Cientifico-Industrial "Mostovik" de Rusia, Oleg Shishov y su comitiva quienes le hicieron una visita de cortesia.

articles.title: Conjunto Artistico del EPC ofrece funcion por 24 de diciembre
articles.content:
Conjunto Artistico del EPC ofrece funcion por 24 de diciembre
Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 22o aniversario del nombramiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y el 96o de natalicio de la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk, tuvo lugar el dia 24 en la Casa Cultural 25 de Abril la funcion artistica "El General es la bandera de victoria eterna".
					Los ejecutantes del Conjunto Artistico del EPC pusieron en la escena el coro mixto "El General es la bandera de la victoria", la cancion con acompanamiento de Kayagum (instrumento musical tradicional) "Pensando en el camino del Songun", la danza Tap "Alegria de un soldado bisono", el baile "Combate decisivo final" y otras piezas.
					
					Ellos elogiaron altamente las hazanas del Generalisimo Kim Jong Il quien al continuar de modo brillante la causa de construccion del ejercito iniciada en el monte Paektu, fortalecio el ejercito popular como el poderoso sin rival y dignifico la patria y consolido el poderio nacional.
					
					El quinteto femenino "Arirang resonado en Jiansanfeng" hace recordar la Heroina Kim Jong Suk quien convirtio la defensa a ultranza al lider en la tradicion eterna del partido y la revolucion y dio la firme continuidad a la tradicion de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					El duo mixto y el coro mixto "Siempre con la bandera del partido", el coro mixto y la danza Tap "Septimo Regimiento siempre esta delante de nosotros" y otras piezas reflejaron emocionadamente la firme conviccion y voluntad de los oficiales y soldados del ejercito de apoyar al Mariscal Kim Jong Un como unico centro de unidad y direccion y enarbolar en alto la bandera roja del Partido del Trabajo de Corea como unico estandarte.
					
					Disfrutaron el espectaculo Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros responsables del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente del partido amigo, los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido, las fuerzas armadas, el Poder, entidades de masas, Consejo de Ministros, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y los soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y el  Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea y los trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					Fueron invitados el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang, los compatriotas en ultramar, los matrimonios de los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises en Corea y de las organizaciones internacionales y los de agregados militares en Corea y los huespedes extranjeros.

articles.title: ?Para quien se necesita doctrina de "amenaza del Norte de Corea"?, pregunta ACNC
articles.content:
?Para quien se necesita doctrina de "amenaza del Norte de Corea"?, pregunta ACNC
Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En estos dias, Estados Unidos difunde ruidosamente la teoria de "amenaza del Norte de Corea (Republica Popular Democratica de Corea)".
					Anuncia que estableceria en la isla Guam el sistema interceptor de misil frente a la "amenaza imprevisible del Norte de Corea". 
					
					Pero, la verdadera intencion de EE.UU. es justificar el cumplimiento de su estrategia de hegemonia sobre la region de Asia-Pacifico. 
					
					Hasta los relacionados del Departamento de Defensa norteamericano insisten publicamente en que el sistema de defensa antimisil que abarca desde Alaska hasta el Sur de Corea, Japon, Filipinas y Australia forma un gran cerco sobre las potencias regionales.  
					
					La "doctrina de amenaza del Norte de Corea" de EE.UU. parte del astuto intento de acelerar el aumento armamentista en la region incluso el establecimiento del sistema antimisiles y resistir a los rivales ocultos. 
					
					A citar por ejemplo, en el informe del "comite de revision de economia y seguridad EE.UU.-China" publicado en noviembre pasado, el imperio insistio en que desafia a la influencia de sus tropas en la region de Asia-Pacifico la capacidad militar de China, ampliada y modernizada vertiginosamente y dotada de capacidad de ataque a las bases militares norteamericanas en la isla Guam. 
					
					Y agrego que a diferencia del fortalecimiento de la capacidad militar de China, se debilita el poderio militar norteamericano debido a la reduccion forzosa de gastos de defensa nacional, y por su consecuencia, se cambia el equilibrio de fuerzas en la region y se disminuye la influencia disuasiva de la estrategia de dar importancia a la region de Asia-Pacifico. 
					
					He aqui la esencia de la cuestion. EE.UU. acelera el establecimiento del sistema de defensa antimisil para resistir a sus rivales regionales y mantener y fortalecer de continuo su supremacia militar. 
					
					Tales maniobras del imperio provocaron gran preocupacion y resistencia de las potencias regionales. 
					
					A finales de noviembre pasado, los aviones norteamericanos B-52 navegaron sin aviso la zona de identificacion de defensa aerea fijada por China, mientras el vocero del Departamento de Defensa norteamericano anuncio publicamente que sus cazabombarderos norteamericanos "navegaron el espacio del archipielago Senkaku". De esta manera, se ha agravado el conflicto entre China y EE.UU. y se ha creado una nueva tension en la region. 
					
					A medida que se agrava mas la confrontacion militar con las potencias regionales, EE.UU. sintio la necesidad de perfeccionar cuanto antes el sistema de combate y operaciones incluso el sistema de defensa antimisil y vuelve a presentar la vieja "doctrina de amenaza del Norte de Corea" con el fin de desviar la atencion de los paises regionales. 
					
					Pero, nadie sera enganado por esta artimana pueril. 
					
					Al contrario, por doquier del mundo se alzan las voces que revelan el caracter enganoso de la doctrina estadounidense. 
					
					La opinion publica mundial estima que "las medidas anti-RPDC de EE.UU. son asimetricas" y que "el establecimiento del sistema antimisiles de EE.UU. es indudablemente para mantener a raya a las potencialidades nucleares de China y Rusia, rivales geopoliticos".
					
					Pues, la "doctrina de amenaza del Norte de Corea" es una sofisteria. 
					
					Es intolerable el intento de EE.UU. que lleva a la fase de tension y catastrofe la situacion de la region de Asia-Pacifico aspirante a la paz y el desarrollo.
